item.title: Making A non wildy Wilderness?[delta]
item.dc:creator: @funkytown funkytown
item.description:

ok when i search that i find this

if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || absX >= 2980 && absX <= 2993 && absY >= 2629 && absY <= 2645 || absX >= 3371 && absX <= 3381 && absY >= 3225 && absY <= 3239) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)) { return true; } }
